strapiPost.title: Natural State Beer Co. Hosts Cigars & Sinatra Night
strapiPost.content:
Natural State Beer Company has a special Cigars & Sinatra night coming up with cigar industry legend Corey Frisbee on Wednesday, Jun 21, at 7p. Not a bad Father's Day gift if your old man is a cigar guy!

  • Come fly with me: Unwind on the patio to the crooning sound of Sinatra and sip a pour of NSBC's limited anniversary beer while Corey Frisbee shares a 'Seed to Smoke' overview and hand rolls premium cigars for each guest.
  • My way: Each ticket includes a 10oz pour of Natural State Beer Co.'s 3rd Anniversary Beer, one NSBC Craft Master Grand Glass, and three cigars handpicked by Corey Frisbee, including one hand-rolled by Corey himself.

Lock in this awesome Father's Day gift before tickets sell out HERE.
